name: 90 more minutes
description:
90 more minutes

WASD To Move (Player and Basket)

E To Interact

5 coins needed to trade time

1 coin needed to play the net game

Catch the yellow balls to earn 2 coins and use the coins for a chance to make your wait shorter.

If you feel as if I need to balance the game any more feel free to tell me.

Background credits - Cyberpunk Street Environment

This is a game I made for Trijam #193 themed patience. It is inspired by another game I have heard about before which takes 300 in real life days to finish, which relates to patience.

This was meant to be an immersive walking simulator so you had reason to wait the full 90 minutes but I didn't have enough time for it.

Enjoy!
